use nyc_taxi_discovery;

--- processing the line delimited JSON file
-- This is auto-generated code; used here to initially review the json file
SELECT 
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type


--- we actually need to split the json ouput into columns and headers using the json value function

SELECT JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, '$.payment_type') payment_type,
       JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, '$.payment_type_desc') payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type


    --- to optimise cost we need to give the columns appropriate column data type instead of the initial varchar(max)


SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
       CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(50)) payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type

-- reviewing the size of data type

exec sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, ''$.payment_type'') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
       CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, ''$.payment_type_desc'') AS VARCHAR(50)) payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''payment_type.json'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''1.0'',
        FIELDQUOTE = ''0x0b'',
        FIELDTERMINATOR =''0x0b'',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''0x0a''
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type'


    --- using the open json function

    
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonContent)
    WITH (
 
       payment_type SMALLINT, payment_type_desc VARCHAR(50)
    );


    --- selecting only the columns u need
     
SELECT payment_type, payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonContent)
    WITH (
 
       payment_type SMALLINT, payment_type_desc VARCHAR(50)
    );


    --- chnging column names

    SELECT payment_type, description
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonContent)
    WITH (
 
       payment_type SMALLINT, 
       description VARCHAR(50) '$.payment_type_desc'
    );


----------------------------------------------------------
----- reading data from JSON arrays
--------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
       CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, '$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS VARCHAR(50)) payment_type_desc_0,
       CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, '$.payment_type_desc[1].value') AS VARCHAR(50)) payment_type_desc_1
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    

-----
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonContent)
    WITH (
 
       payment_type SMALLINT, 
       payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
    )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
    WITH (
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        value VARCHAR (20)
    )
    ;

---- TO GET THE RIGHT COLUMNS AND VALUES
SELECT payment_type, payment_type_desc_value
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonContent)
    WITH (
 
       payment_type SMALLINT, 
       payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
    )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
    WITH (
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc_value VARCHAR (20) '$.value'
    )
    ;

----------------------------------------------------------
----- reading data from standard JSON 
--------------------------------------------------------------

SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonContent)
    WITH (
 
       rate_code_id TINYINT, 
       rate_code VARCHAR(20)
    );


----------------------------------------------------------
----- reading data Multiline JSON 
--------------------------------------------------------------

SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code_multi_line.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonContent)
    WITH (
 
       rate_code_id TINYINT, 
       rate_code VARCHAR(20)
    );
